document.full_text: members of militant islamist forums vowed on monday to avenge the u.s. killing of osama bin laden, while others prayed the news was not true.
document.title: islamists vow bin laden death will not mute jihad call
lines_and_colors: members of militant islamist forums vowed on monday to avenge the u.s. killing of osama bin laden, while others prayed the news was not true.
